name: Hezrou
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Magic Resistance: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Stench: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.
